Title: Relates to early intervention reimbursement rates
Summary: Provides that on and after April first, two thousand twenty-five, the department of health shall reimburse municipalities in an amount of sixty-six percent or more for the costs of early intervention services; directs the commissioner of health to review rates of reimbursement for early intervention services.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to Medicaid reimbursement rates for early intervention services
